name: absmuld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, (abs `(c0[×]c1))=((abs ` c0)[×](abs ` c1)), c0 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℂ)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmul, c1)), co(cfv(cabs, c0), cmul, cfv(cabs, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: Absolute value distributes over multiplication. Proposition 10-3.7(f) of [Gleason] p. 133. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
